verses.verse: And when any<WH5315> will offer<WH7126> a meat<WH4503> offering<WH7133> unto the LORD<WH3068>, his offering<WH7133> shall be of fine flour<WH5560>; and he shall pour<WH3332> oil<WH8081> upon it, and put<WH5414> frankincense<WH3828> thereon:

And he shall bring<WH935> it to Aaron's<WH175> sons<WH1121> the priests<WH3548>: and he shall take<WH7061> thereout<WH8033> his handful<WH7062> <WH4393> of the flour<WH5560> thereof, and of the oil<WH8081> thereof, with all the frankincense<WH3828> thereof; and the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> the memorial<WH234> of it upon the altar<WH4196>, to be an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> savour<WH7381> unto the LORD<WH3068>:

And the remnant<WH3498> of the meat offering<WH4503> shall be Aaron's<WH175> and his sons'<WH1121>: it is a thing most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> of the offerings<WH801> of the LORD<WH3068> made by fire<WH801>.

And if thou bring<WH7126> an oblation<WH7133> of a meat offering<WH4503> baken<WH3989> in the oven<WH8574>, it shall be unleavened<WH4682> cakes<WH2471> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, or unleavened<WH4682> wafers<WH7550> anointed<WH4886> with oil<WH8081>.

And if thy oblation<WH7133> be a meat offering<WH4503> baken in a pan<WH4227>, it shall be of fine flour<WH5560> unleavened<WH4682>, mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>. in a pan: or, on a flat plate, or, slice
Thou shalt part<WH6626> it in pieces<WH6595>, and pour<WH3332> oil<WH8081> thereon: it is a meat offering<WH4503>.
And if thy oblation<WH7133> be a meat offering<WH4503> baken in the fryingpan<WH4802>, it shall be made<WH6213> of fine flour<WH5560> with oil<WH8081>.

And thou shalt bring<WH935> the meat offering<WH4503> that is made<WH6213> of these things unto the LORD<WH3068>: and when it is presented<WH7126> unto the priest<WH3548>, he shall bring<WH5066> it unto the altar<WH4196>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH7311> from the meat offering<WH4503> a memorial<WH234> thereof, and shall burn<WH6999> it upon the altar<WH4196>: it is an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> savour<WH7381> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

And that which is left<WH3498> of the meat offering<WH4503> shall be Aaron's<WH175> and his sons'<WH1121>: it is a thing most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> of the offerings<WH801> of the LORD<WH3068> made by fire<WH801>.

No meat offering<WH4503>, which ye shall bring<WH7126> unto the LORD<WH3068>, shall be made<WH6213> with leaven<WH2557>: for ye shall burn<WH6999> no leaven<WH7603>, nor any honey<WH1706>, in any offering<WH801> of the LORD<WH3068> made by fire<WH801>.

As for the oblation<WH7133> of the firstfruits<WH7225>, ye shall offer<WH7126> them unto the LORD<WH3068>: but they shall not be burnt<WH5927> on the altar<WH4196> for a sweet<WH5207> savour<WH7381>. be burnt: Heb. ascend

And every oblation<WH7133> of thy meat offering<WH4503> shalt thou season<WH4414> with salt<WH4417>; neither shalt thou suffer the salt<WH4417> of the covenant<WH1285> of thy God<WH430> to be lacking<WH7673> from thy meat offering<WH4503>: with all thine offerings<WH7133> thou shalt offer<WH7126> salt<WH4417>.

And if thou offer<WH7126> a meat offering<WH4503> of thy firstfruits<WH1061> unto the LORD<WH3068>, thou shalt offer<WH7126> for the meat offering<WH4503> of thy firstfruits<WH1061> green ears<WH24> of corn dried<WH7033> by the fire<WH784>, even corn beaten<WH1643> out of full ears<WH3759>.
And thou shalt put<WH5414> oil<WH8081> upon it, and lay<WH7760> frankincense<WH3828> thereon: it is a meat offering<WH4503>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> the memorial<WH234> of it, part of the beaten corn<WH1643> thereof, and part of the oil<WH8081> thereof, with all the frankincense<WH3828> thereof: it is an offering made by fire<WH801> unto the LORD<WH3068>.
